name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Confetti! Confetti all over... What else?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Confetti! Confetti all over... What else?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the button or use the shortcut key and watch as colorful confetti bursts across your screen! Try it out and let me know what you think. Iâ€™d love to hear your feedback or any ideas to make it even more exciting!

## UPDATES ##
- You can now pick your own colors for the confetti.

Trigger your confetti with:
 - Windows: Ctrl + B
 - Mac: Command + B
To change the shortcut key go to: chrome://extensions/shortcuts in your chrome browser

Press the confetti icon in the top-right corner of your Chrome window to unleash a burst of confetti.
Right-click the confetti icon to access the options menu.

## NOTES
- Some sites will block the confetti extension.
- reload the page to stop the confetti.


Have fun,
Dennis.
